answers.answer: You mentioned taking herbs for diabetes, are you a diabetic? Have you been monitoring your blood sugar levels? Frequent urination and dry mouth are classic signs of diabetes. As far as the dry lips, do you breathe through your mouth when you run? You may not notice it, but breathing through the mouth rather than through the nose will dry out your lips fast. The skin on the lips is very thin and fragile. Try using Caramex when ever you notice the dryness. It will heal the chapped and shredded lips in a few days to a week if used several times a day.(use the little pot, not the tube. It's a beezwax base and will stay on your lips longer)You can find it at any Walgreen's for around $2.  And drink plenty of water, even if it makes you pee more. That's how you flush impurities out of your body. But really it sounds like most of your symptoms are diabetes. Get checked out to make sure your keeping your sugar levels under control.
